searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Return resources linked to by the given target

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: _language
searchParam.documentation: The language of the resource

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

searchParam.name: _profile
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given profile

searchParam.name: _security
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given security labels

searchParam.name: _tag
searchParam.documentation: Search for resources which have the given tag

searchParam.name: _text
searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Any one of the individuals participating in the appointment

searchParam.name: appointment-type
searchParam.documentation: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

searchParam.name: based-on
searchParam.documentation: The service request this appointment is allocated to assess

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Appointment date/time.

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An Identifier of the Appointment

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

searchParam.name: part-status
searchParam.documentation: The Participation status of the subject, or other participant on the appointment. Can be used to locate participants that have not responded to meeting requests.

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

searchParam.name: service-type
searchParam.documentation: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The overall status of the appointment

searchParam.name: appointmentGroupId
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding resources based on group id

searchParam.name: responsible
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding responsible entity on Appointment

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: A code defined in the code system

searchParam.name: content-mode
searchParam.documentation: not-present | example | fragment | complete

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The code system publication date

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: The description of the code system

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External identifier for the code system

searchParam.name: jurisdiction
searchParam.documentation: Intended jurisdiction for the code system

searchParam.name: language
searchParam.documentation: A language in which a designation is provided

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Computationally friendly name of the code system

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the code system

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the code system

searchParam.name: system
searchParam.documentation: The system for any codes defined by this code system (same as 'url')

searchParam.name: title
searchParam.documentation: The human-friendly name of the code system

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The uri that identifies the code system

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The business version of the code system

searchParam.name: based-on
searchParam.documentation: Request fulfilled by this communication

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Message category

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: Encounter or episode leading to message

searchParam.name: definition
searchParam.documentation: Instantiates protocol or definition

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter leading to message

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique identifier

searchParam.name: medium
searchParam.documentation: A channel of communication

searchParam.name: part-of
searchParam.documentation: Part of this action

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Focus of message

searchParam.name: received
searchParam.documentation: When received

searchParam.name: recipient
searchParam.documentation: Message recipient

searchParam.name: sender
searchParam.documentation: Message sender

searchParam.name: sent
searchParam.documentation: When sent

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: preparation | in-progress | suspended | aborted | completed | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Focus of message

searchParam.name: administrativeStatus
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on administrative status

searchParam.name: recipientIdentifier
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on the identifier(s) of the recipient

searchParam.name: threadId
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on thread id

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on period

searchParam.name: communicationCategory
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on the category code

searchParam.name: careTeamRecipient
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on CareTeam recipient

searchParam.name: communicationGroupId
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding resources based on group id

searchParam.name: careTeamSender
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on CareTeam sender

searchParam.name: restrictionCategory
searchParam.documentation: Search parameter for finding communication based on CareTeam recipient

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: identifier

searchParam.documentation: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Indicates if the related person record is active

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-country
searchParam.documentation: A country specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postal code specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-state
searchParam.documentation: A state specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-use
searchParam.documentation: A use code specified in an address

searchParam.name: birthdate
searchParam.documentation: The Related Person's date of birth

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the related person

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An Identifier of the RelatedPerson

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient this related person is related to

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: phonetic
searchParam.documentation: A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

searchParam.name: telecom
searchParam.documentation: The value in any kind of contact

searchParam.documentation: Types of resource (if a resource reference)

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: number | date | string | token | reference | composite | quantity | uri

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The uri that identifies the search parameter

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The business version of the search parameter
